description:
cmd/gc, cmd/ld: rename -b to -race

There's no b in race detector.
The new flag matches the one in the go command
(go test -race math).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=28af76d9a25b ***

cmd/gc, cmd/ld: rename -b to -race

There's no b in race detector.
The new flag matches the one in the go command
(go test -race math).

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7072043

subject: code review 7072043: cmd/gc, cmd/ld: rename -b to -race
